```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readr)
employed_gender <- read.csv("employed_gender.csv")
ggplot(employed_gender, aes(x = year, y = full_time_female)) +
  geom_point(color = "hotpink") +
  labs(
    x = "Year",
    y = "% Of Women Employed Full-Time",
    title = "Women Employed Full-Time Per Year",
  )
```
